name: Security Check Before Commit
description: Scans code for potential security issues before committing

action.content:
Please review the following files for security issues:
1. Check for hardcoded secrets or API keys
2. Verify no sensitive data is being logged
3. Ensure all user inputs are validated
4. Confirm encryption is applied before transmission
5. Check that private keys are never transmitted

Focus on files in: web-app/src/crypto.js, backend/modules/auth/, api/auth/
